creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: cylindrical shaped roof tile; circle and joined teardrop shapes in relief at end; two small birds perched on top of tile; one bird bends head toward small wasp at edge of tile on one long side; brown patina
marks: Signature and Sticker on bottom, incised: {Kogyokusai}
title: Roof tile with pair of sparrows and wasp
